org.wlf.filedownloader

类 FileDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wlf.filedownloader.FileDownloader

  • public final class FileDownloader
extends Object
    FileDownloader
    文件下载框架
    从以下版本开始:
    0.2.0
    作者:
    wlf(Andy)

      static void detect(String url, OnDetectUrlFileListener onDetectUrlFileListener)
      已过时。 
      this method can not detect the url file which bigger than 2G, use detect(String, OnDetectBigUrlFileListener)instead

      • registerDownloadStatusListener

        public static void registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener onFileDownloadStatusListener)
        register an OnFileDownloadStatusListener
        参数:
        onFileDownloadStatusListener - OnFileDownloadStatusListener impl, or use OnRetryableFileDownloadStatusListener, which can retry download when download failed once when use .Builder#configRetryDownloadTimes(int) to config the retry times

      • registerDownloadStatusListener

        public static void registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener onFileDownloadStatusListener,
                                  DownloadStatusConfiguration downloadStatusConfiguration)
        register an OnFileDownloadStatusListener with Configuration
        参数:
        onFileDownloadStatusListener - OnFileDownloadStatusListener impl, or use OnRetryableFileDownloadStatusListener, which can retry download when download failed once when use .Builder#configRetryDownloadTimes(int) to config the retry times
        downloadStatusConfiguration - Configuration for the OnFileDownloadStatusListener impl
        从以下版本开始:
        0.3.0

      • unregisterDownloadStatusListener

        public static void unregisterDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener onFileDownloadStatusListener)
        unregister an OnFileDownloadStatusListener
        参数:
        onFileDownloadStatusListener - registered OnFileDownloadStatusListener or OnRetryableFileDownloadStatusListener impl

      • detect

        @Deprecated
public static void detect(String url,
                     OnDetectUrlFileListener onDetectUrlFileListener)
        已过时。 this method can not detect the url file which bigger than 2G, use detect(String, OnDetectBigUrlFileListener)instead
        detect a url file
        参数:
        url - file url
        onDetectUrlFileListener - OnDetectUrlFileListener impl

      • detect

          OnDetectBigUrlFileListener onDetectBigUrlFileListener)
        detect a big url file, which means can detect the url file bigger than 2G
        参数:
        url - file url
        onDetectBigUrlFileListener - OnDetectBigUrlFileListener impl

        0.3.0

          OnDetectBigUrlFileListener onDetectBigUrlFileListener,
          DownloadConfiguration downloadConfiguration)

      • createAndStart

        public static void createAndStart(String url,
                  String saveDir,
                  String fileName)
        create a new download after detected a url file by using detect(String, OnDetectBigUrlFileListener)
        if the caller cares for the download status, please register an listener before by using
        registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener)
        registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener, DownloadStatusConfiguration)
        参数:
        url - file url
        saveDir - saveDir
        fileName - saveFileName

      • createAndStart

      • rename

        public static void rename(String url,
          String newFileName,
          boolean includedSuffix,
          OnRenameDownloadFileListener onRenameDownloadFileListener)
        rename a download file
        参数:
        url - file url
        newFileName - new file name
        includedSuffix - true means the newFileName has been included the suffix, otherwise the newFileName not include the suffix
